text.__SUMMARY__: Aspergillus carneus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus.Aspergillus carneus produces Aspergillicin A - E and citrinin
text.Further reading:
Machida, Masayuki; Gomi, Katsuya (2010). Aspergillus: Molecular Biology and Genomics. Horizon Scientific Press. ISBN 9781904455530.
Infektionen III (in German). Springer-Verlag. 2013. ISBN 9783662220313.
Houben-Weyl Methods of Organic Chemistry Vol. IV/1d, 4th Edition: Reduction II (in German). Georg Thieme Verlag. 2014. ISBN 9783131797148.
